verbs.description: So [V: paying] [ARG2: Michael Cohen] [ARG1: $ 100,000 per month] actually yielded a benefit to BigPharma . President Trump 's drug pricing plan will not include a call for Medicare to negotiate drug prices , a leading Democratic idea that Trump previously supported , ...
